meta.description: Golynskaya Tatiana. Aesthetic beautician. ️Ultrasonic facial cleansing. Chem. Peelings. ️Chiromassage of the face. Mesotherapy. ️Cryotherapy. Record on consultation: +380667700948

intro.title:
Your beauty deserves
more than you do for it

about.title: About myself
about.description: Tatiana Golynskaya is a universal cosmetologist. Over the past 25 years, she has accumulated extensive practical experience. Tatiana knows the specific requirements and needs of customers. Combining their knowledge and experience with leading cosmetic brands.

accordions.title: Description
accordions.text: Holy Land cosmetics are produced in Israel and has been helped to take care of the health of the skin with the help of unique formulas and compositions based on natural ingredients of the highest quality. Products are aimed at restoring healthy natural skin functioning. The effectiveness of formulas and drugs is proved by research and reviews of cosmetologists, and security is confirmed by certificates.

cosmetic.title: Cosmetics with which we work
cosmetic.description: Unique rejuvenating and restoring facial procedures using cosmetics world-famous brands. These exclusive lines are created using the latest technologies, as well as natural components. Each line is unique and has a wide range of action.

certificates.title: You are in reliable hands
certificates.description: Your face will bloom in a friendly atmosphere and care. Turning to me, you beat the health and beauty of a professional.

consultation.title: How is the consultation? *

items.title: Diagnostics of skin condition
items.description: At the consultation, a specialist conducts detailed skin diagnostics.

items.title: Analysis of existing home care
items.description: During the consultation specialist will conduct a thorough analysis of the existing care of your request will evaluate storage products, will give feedback regarding errors and the adequacy of the preparations of your skin condition.

items.title: Defining home care objectives
items.description: A specialist with you will determine the goals that can be achieved by home care, and if necessary, the realism of the request will advise the methods of achieving goals by other methods.

items.title: Defining home care objectives
items.description: A specialist with you will determine the goals that can be achieved by home care, and if necessary, the realism of the request will advise the methods of achieving goals by other methods.

consultation.detail-strong: * Book a 30-minute virtual advice and skin care check.
consultation.detail: Consultation is carried out without leaving the house, adapted to your unique needs and will help you give the right recommendations on products, it will help with the skin care regimen and will help with any skin care guidelines, tools and facial care devices. I can also demonstrate the products, clean your cosmetic office and share tips and tricks by providing individual tips.
